verses.verse: A Psalm of the sons of Korah; a Song. His foundation <S%H3248><s%> is in the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountains <S%H2042><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> loveth <S%H157><s%> the gates <S%H8179><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> More than all the dwellings <S%H4908><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.
Glorious things <S%H3513><s%> are spoken <S%H1696><s%> of thee <S%H5892><s%>, O city of God <S%H430><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

I will make mention <S%H2142><s%> of Rahab <S%H7294><s%> and Babylon <S%H894><s%> as among them that know <S%H3045><s%> me <S%H6429><s%>: Behold, Philistia, and Tyre <S%H6865><s%>, with Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%>: This one was born there <S%H3205><s%>.
Yea <S%H6726><s%>, of Zion it shall be said <S%H559><s%>, This one and that one <S%H376><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> in her <S%H5945><s%>; And the Most High himself will establish her <S%H3559><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will count <S%H5608><s%>, when he writeth up <S%H3789><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%>, This one was born <S%H3205><s%> there <S%H5542><s%>. [[Selah
They that sing <S%H7891><s%> as well as they that dance <S%H2490><s%> shall say <S%H4599><s%>, All my fountains are in thee.
